newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Mass. Health and Educational.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Mass. Health and Educational.

text.p: Notice is hereby given that sealed bids will be received by the Massachusetts Health and Educational Facilities Authority at its offices at 99 Summer Street, Suite 1000, 10th Floor, Boston, Massachusetts 02110 on
until 11:00 a.m. New York time for the purchase of
$7,580,000* principal amount of its Revenue Bonds, Stonehill College Issue, Series F (the Bonds'').

The Bonds offered for sale will be dated as of August 1, 1996 and will mature or have sinking fund redemption on July 1 in the years 1997 through 2026, as more fully described in the Official Notice of Sale.

The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder complying with the terms of the Official Notice ofSale and offering to purchase all of the Bonds at the lowest interest cost, calculated in accordance with the true interest cost (TIC) method. All bids must be accompanied by a certified or cashier's check or surety bond in the amount of $151,600 payable to the Massachusetts Health and Educational Facilities Authority or naming it as the beneficiary, in the case of a surety bond.
Copies of the Preliminary Official Statement, the Official Notice of Sale and the Official Bid Form relating to the Bonds may be obtained from Patricia A. Fahy at the
Authority, 99 Summer St., Suite 1000, Boston, Massachusetts 02110 (617) 737-8377 or Public Financial Management, Inc. at 99 Summer Street, Suite 1020, Boston, Massachusetts 02110 (617) 330-6914.
Massachusetts Health and Educational Facilities Authority
By: Robert J. Ciolek, Executive Director
*Preliminary, subject to change as described in the Official Notice of Sale.
